title: Injustice: Gods Among Us: Year Two, Vol. 2
description: The sequel to the New York Times best-selling graphic novel INJUSTICE: GODS AMONG US VOL. 2. With Superman's reign over Earth secured, the Green Lantern Corps dispatch Kyle Rayner to investigate the situation. But when he mysteriously disappears, the Guardians of the Galaxy are left with no choice but to remove Superman from his self-appointed throne. But like all the others who have stood in Superman's way since the death of his beloved wife, the Corps has a fight on their hands that will surely shake them to the core. Collects Injustice: Gods Among Us Year 2 #7-12.
author: Tom    Taylor
